meanings.definition: Easily affected or influenced by external stimuli.
meanings.sent1: Some people are very sensitives to loud noises.
meanings.sent2: She is a sensitives person who gets upset easily.
meanings.sent3: The sensitives cat jumped at the sound of a door closing.
meanings.sent4: The delicate flower was as sensitives as a fragile glass sculpture.
meanings.sent5: His sensitives nature made him cry at sad movies.

meanings.definition: A person who is highly attuned to their emotions and the emotions of others.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a sensitives and always knows how I feel.
meanings.sent2: Sensitives often make great counselors due to their empathy.
meanings.sent3: The sensitives in our group always knows when someone is upset.
meanings.sent4: She was a sensitives, picking up on the slightest change in mood.
meanings.sent5: The sensitives could sense the tension in the room before anyone else.
